attributes.description:
2016 AUDI Q5, 127343 KM, SILVER with BLACK.

04054311
  All available records show the odometer reading on this vehicle to be accurate. There is not a skip or slip, just pure smoothness in this vehicle's transmission. The vehicle engine runs very, very smooth. This vehicle's exterior is very clean. This is a very well maintained vehicle with a clean interior. You should feel good with at least 75% of tire wear left on this set of rubber.

attributes.description: KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. All our vehicles have to pass a DEKRA Condition Report, DEKRA roadworthy certificate and an 125 point  quality check at our workshop for your peace of mind motoring. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. Trade in's accepted and nationwide delivery can be arranged, call now, one of our Sales executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our dealership.

attributes.description:
Clean 2014 Audi Q5 3.0 TDI Quattro S-Tronic S-Line with 157,000km and full agents service history.

4 brand new tyres, smash and grab window tinting, leather interior, auto headlights, multi functional steering wheel, cruise control etc.

R299,995. Finance available. Call Devon at Pengelly Autos 0217011986 or 0825364216 anytime. Pengelly Autos hand pick their vehicles, only buying from the owner. We do not buy from auctions, repos etc. We are a financial service provider (FSP no: 22186). Situated at 292 Main Rd, Tokai. We offer finance through all the major banks as well as offering extended warranties, insurance etc. We also accept trade ins. Website www.pengellyautos.co.za To apply for finance, please click on the finance tab on our website.

attributes.description:
All vehicles are available for CASH,FINANCE AND RENT TO OWN ON SELECTED CARS. Roadworthy are subject to payment for Change of ownership. Our finance is done through all major banks with an additional administrative charge of  R10.000- R15.000 depending on the car. Trade-ins are also accepted , delivery is nationwide and fees are charged based on location. Buying a used car from us means buying Peace of mind, Quality, Choice and Value. 
PRE-OWNED CAR DEALERSHIP IN GAUTENG JOHANNESBURG WITH VEHICLES IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. YOU CAN COME THROUGH TO OUR DEALERSHIP AT NO. 6 JOUBERT STREET AND CORNER ALBERT, BEHIND SARS OFFICES. PLEASE DO CONTACT OUR EXECUTIVE SALES REP. VUYO ON 0763933070 OR CALL ON 0100234810. 

THANK YOU. SIYABONGA. KEALEBOHA. DANKIE.
